channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- Ubiquiti EdgeRouter(s) and USG(s)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- Ubiquiti EdgeRouter(s) and USG(s)

item.title: CVE-2023-23912|2023-02-09T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- ubiquiti%20edgerouter%28s%29%20and%20usg%28s%29
item.description: A vulnerability, found in EdgeRouters Version 2.0.9-hotfix.5 and earlier and UniFi Security Gateways (USG) Version 4.4.56 and earlier with their DHCPv6 prefix delegation set to dhcpv6-stateless or dhcpv6-stateful, allows a malicious actor directly connected to the WAN interface of an affected device to create a remote code execution vulnerability.
